A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really enjoyed this movie but even more so the 2nd time. the 1st viewing I was stumped for words but after seeing it a 2nd time the day later I appreciated everything they did and all of the 'risks' they took.\nfar from the worst Star Wars film but not top 3.\nThere are some scenes that are the best they've ever been and this truly felt like Star Wars.
